akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1305. Short title of chapter This chapter may be cited as the “Social Security Act”. (Aug. 14, 1935, ch. 531, title XI, § 1105, 49 Stat. 648.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Short Title of 2025 AmendmentPub. L. 118–273, § 1, Jan. 5, 2025, 138 Stat. 3232, provided that: “This Act [amending sections 402 and 415 of this title and enacting provisions set out as a note under section 402 of this title] may be cited as the ‘Social Security Fairness Act of 2023’.”
Pub. L. 118–258, § 1, Jan. 4, 2025, 138 Stat. 2947, provided that: “This Act [see Tables for classifications] may be cited as the ‘Supporting America’s Children and Families Act’.”
Pub. L. 118–258, title I, § 101(a), Jan. 4, 2025, 138 Stat. 2947, provided that: “This title [enacting sections 628d, 629k, and 629(l) of this title, amending sections 622 to 625, 627, 628, 629a to 629i, 629m, and 674 of this title, and enacting provisions set out as notes under sections 622 and 629k of this title] may be cited as the ‘Protecting America’s Children by Strengthening Families Act’.”
Pub. L. 118–258, title II, § 201, Jan. 4, 2025, 138 Stat. 2970, provided that: “This title [amending sections 653, 654, and 664 of this title and sections 6103 and 6402 of Title 26, Internal Revenue Code] may be cited as the ‘Strengthening State and Tribal Child Support Enforcement Act’.”
Short Title of 2024 AmendmentPub. L. 118–120, § 1, Nov. 25, 2024, 138 Stat. 1626, provided that: “This Act [amending section 506 of this title and enacting provisions set out as a note under section 506 of this title] may be cited as the ‘Building on Reemployment Improvements to Deliver Good Employment for Workers Act’ or the ‘BRIDGE for Workers Act’.”
Pub. L. 118–69, § 1, July 12, 2024, 138 Stat. 1485, provided that: “This Act [amending section 701 of this title] may be cited as the ‘Maternal and Child Health Stillbirth Prevention Act of 2024’.”
Short Title of 2023 AmendmentPub. L. 117–341, § 1, Jan. 5, 2023, 136 Stat. 6179, provided tha
